fees.name: Security Handling Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged per occurrence. Payable in the following circumstances; deed of priority, title production, variation of priority, consent or name change.

fees.name: Discharge of Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: For the preparation of a discharge of mortgage.

fees.name: Progress Draw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable per property when a loan will be drawn progressively for either construction or major renovation purposes. The fee includes the cost of all progress draws and the final inspection.

fees.name: Documentation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable in the following circumstances: preparation of an additional mortgage; preparation of a guarantee; or where documents have been cancelled or redone, at your request, after contracts have been issued.

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Valuation Fee at cost and payable by member.

fees.name: Portability Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged per occasion when you wish to change the security(ies) against an existing loan(s) and there is no change to the existing loan(s) amount, loan interest rate or type, term of the loan(s), product type, borrowers or mortgagors. Discharge fees may also apply.

fees.name: Bank Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Bank Cheque Fee at cost to People's Choice per cheque

fees.name: Solicitor's/Conveyancer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable at-cost on the date of settlement and covers activities such as reviewing the contract of sale, conducting property searches, liaising with your financial institution, and preparing for settlement to ensure a smooth transaction.

fees.name: Land Title Office Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Any fee payable at-cost on the date of settlement that are charged by the various states Land Title Offices regarding but not limited to registration of mortgage, transfer of title, property and title searches.

fees.name: Arrears Administration Fee 1
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you fail to make repayments due under your credit contract and you do not pay an amount sufficient to clear all repayment arrears within 7 days of us notifying you that your account is in arrears.

fees.name: Arrears Administration Fee 2
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you fail to make repayments due under your credit contract and your account remains in arrears for a period of 20 days or more.

fees.name: Enforcement of Mortgage fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged whenever an enforcement notice is issued in relation to a credit contract that is secured by a mortgage over real property.

features.additionalInfo: Freedom to make unlimited extra repayments – reduce your loan term and save money
Ability to pay the loan over 30 years for Chief Executive Officer (Housing) loans

Introduced 1 January 2013. Must be approved in principle for a Low Deposit Loan. CEOH lends up to 10% of purchase price as a deposit for the purchase of a new home or land off the plan. Max. purchase price: $550K 3 brm or more, $475K 1-2 brm.  Loan repaid by a 931 product when property purchased. Or, if contract not completed and deposit refunded, loan converted to unsecured personal loan repayable over maximum overall term of seven years.
Flexible repayment frequency - pay weekly, fortnightly or monthly.
